name: Disc 11
description: A dedicated open-source music bot for Zhycorp based on Jukebox.

YT_API_KEY.description: YouTube API Key for querying the YouTube API for video data

CONFIG_EMBED_COLOR.description: The color for your bot's embed message

CONFIG_OWNERS.description: A Discord ID(s), use comma if you want to add more than 1 owner (DO NOT ADD SOMEONE ELSE ID THAT YOU DON'T TRUST)

CONFIG_TOTALSHARDS.description: Total shards to spawn, use "auto" or a number (default: auto)

CONFIG_ALLOW_DUPLICATE.description: Whether to allow users to add duplicate of music (yes or no) (default: yes)

CONFIG_DISABLE_SONG_SELECTION.description: Whether to disable selecting songs on play command, this will automatically selects the first song from search results (default: no)

CONFIG_SEARCH_MAX_RESULTS.description: Maximum songs to list in song selection (default: 10, max: 10)

CONFIG_SELECT_TIMEOUT.description: Select song timeout when searching songs (in seconds) (default: 20 seconds)

CONFIG_DELETE_QUEUE_TIMEOUT.description: Timeout in seconds before queue is deleted when no one is in the voice channel (default: 180 <3 minutes>)

CONFIG_CACHE_YOUTUBE_DOWNLOADS.description: Whether to download and cache videos from youtube (yes or no) (default: no)

CONFIG_CACHE_MAX_LENGTH.description: Max music length in seconds that are allowed to cached (default: 5400 <1 hour 30 minutes>)

CONFIG_DISABLE_INVITE_CMD.description: Whether to disable invite command or not (default: no)

CONFIG_DEBUG.description: Should logging use debug level? Please note that this is not recommended in production (default: no)

CONFIG_STATUS_TYPE.description: What type of status does the bot use (playing, listening, or watching) (default: listening)

CONFIG_STATUS_ACTIVITY.description: What status does the bot display (default: "music on {guildsCount} guilds!") (available variables: guildsCount, usersCount, playingCount, and botPrefix). NOTE ON {usersCount} VARIABLE: This only displays cached usersCount, to get full usersCount, please enable CONFIG_FETCH_ALL_USERS

CONFIG_FETCH_ALL_USERS.description: Whether to fetch all users on startup (warning: increased memory usage especially for bots with large users) (default: no) (note: You need to enable privileged GUILD_MEMBERS Intents on the Discord's developer page)
